discussion.content: Given answer is correct -> Error, warning, info, trace, verbose

questions.question_text:
DRAG DROP -
If Critical is the highest Log Level severity for UiPath Robots, what is the correct priority sequence, from the highest to the lowest severity, of the remaining Log Levels?
Instructions: Drag and drop the highest severity level to the top of the list and repeat until the lowest severity level appears at the bottom of the list.
//IMG//

A developer is working on an automation in the Robotic Enterprise (RE) Framework. Each transaction item represents customer data. The automated process must click on the "Generate Shipment Details" button for each customer. Ideally, this generates a table of shipping records per customer.
If the generated table displays only the header row and no data is available for the current customer, then it should be marked as an exception since the data is not available and processing for that customer should stop. What is this type of exception?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Businessrule exception and again.... Siuuuu!

Selected Answer: C
C is correct answer !

questions.question_text: A developer wants to create both a Dispatcher process and a Performer process using the Robotic Enterprise (RE) Framework. By default, which type of process architecture is the REFramework template?

discussion.content:

Agree with answer

I got 100% for my Studio section in UIARD exam

questions.question_text: A developer published a new library from UiPath Studio to the Orchestrator feed. The developer is connected to the same Orchestrator where the library is published. Which steps are required to add this library as a dependency to a project?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
The given answer is correct

choices.B:
Open the Manage Packages Window and install UiPath.System.Activities.
Drag and Drop the Invoke Method activity and input the library name as a parameter.
choices.C:
Open the Manage Packages Window and ensure the Orchestrator feed is enabled.
Go to the Imports Panel in Studio, search for the package by name, and then install the package.
choices.D:
Open the Manage Packages Window and ensure the Orchestrator feed is enabled.
Go to the Search bar, search for the package by name, and then install the package.
choices.A:
Open the Manage Packages Window and install UiPath.System.Activities.
Drag and Drop the Invoke Com Method activity and input the library name as a parameter
